groups.label: WindowInfo_Contents_RestrictPhoto
groups.text:
The current Parental Controls settings
restrict the sharing of data that may
contain personal information, such as
images, audio, video, and long text data.

groups.label: WindowWait_Cinema_CancelEula
groups.text:
Nintendo DSi Library
cannot be used.

groups.label: WindowWait_MemoExchange_Restrict
groups.text:
Data sharing is restricted by
Parental Controls, so it is
not possible to exchange
flipnotes.

groups.label: WindowWait_Cinema_Restrict
groups.text:
Nintendo DSi Library is
restricted by Parental Controls
settings and cannot be used.
